## Description {#details}

===- <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/droppedvariablestats-h">DroppedVariableStats.h</a> - Opt Diagnostics -&#42;- C++ -&#42;-------------—===//

Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions. See <a href="https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt">https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt</a> for license information. SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception

===------------------------------------------------------------------—===//

Dropped Variable Statistics for Debug Information. Reports any number of #dbg&#95;value that get dropped due to an optimization pass.

===------------------------------------------------------------------—===//

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;VarID, DILocation &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;InlinedAtsMap = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/droppedvariablestats/#a276914a247d61781f51e41186a9dc2af">InlinedAts</a>.back()&#91;FuncName&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find an Instruction that shares the same scope as the dropped #dbg&#95;value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or has a scope that is the child of the scope of the #dbg&#95;value, and has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an inlinedAt equal to the inlinedAt of the #dbg&#95;value or it&#39;s inlinedAt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chain contains the inlinedAt of the #dbg&#95;value, if such an Instruction is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// found, debug information is dropped.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a07ea053ea2cdbee8e68ebd607c26dc8a">VarID</a> Var : DebugVariablesBeforeSet) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DebugVariablesAfterSet.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#ad409c2de8502b94c8a0b1193307c63b6">contains</a>(Var))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">      removeVarFromAllSets(Var, Func);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PassDroppedVariables = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Found another instruction in the variable&#39;s scope, so there exists a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// break point at which the variable could be observed. Count it as</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DroppedCount++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Remove a dropped debug variable&#39;s VarID from all Sets in the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not remove Var from the last element, it will be popped from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;DebugVariablesMap : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9b64313b5c1907066b7bab1c60a2ea08">llvm::drop&#95;end</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/droppedvariablestats/#a956a96918980eb304dedaa78b88c0d3c">DebugVariablesStack</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return true if \\p Scope is the same as \\p DbgValScope or a child scope of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p DbgValScope, return false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isScopeChildOfOrEqualTo(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/discope">DIScope</a> &#42;Scope,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/discope">DIScope</a> &#42;DbgValScope) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Scope != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/droppedvariablestats/#a07e15724976aed7adc5b3a178548ca77">VisitedScope</a>.find(Scope) == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/droppedvariablestats/#a07e15724976aed7adc5b3a178548ca77">VisitedScope</a>.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
